title: Report Water Theft
description: A citizen reports that someone has illegally connected a hose to a fire hydrant to fill a swimming pool.

tasks.description: Get the location of the incident.
Create a high-priority investigation case for the revenue protection department.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a new water theft investigation case.

tasks.description: Dispatch a field technician to the location to disconnect the illegal connection and secure the hydrant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches a crew to the site.
